title: Testing in binary response index models
summary: Denote a binary response index model as: P [ Y i = 1 ∣ X i ] = G ( X i β ) {\displaystyle P[Y_{i}=1\mid X_{i}]=G(X_{i}\beta )} , [ Y i = 0 ∣ X i ] = 1 − G ( X i ′ β ) {\displaystyle [Y_{i}=0\mid X_{i}]=1-G(X_{i}'\beta )} where X i ∈ R N {\displaystyle X_{i}\in R^{N}} .
